name: Walter T. CURRIE, Petitioner v. WORKERS' COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (WHEATLAND TUBE CO.), Respondents
name_abbreviation: Currie v. Workers' Compensation Appeal Board

parties: Walter T. CURRIE, Petitioner v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (WHEATLAND TUBE CO.), Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of October, 2008, the Application for Leave to Amend and the Petition for Allowance of Appeal are hereby DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
958 A.2d 1044
Walter T. CURRIE, Petitioner v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (WHEATLAND TUBE CO.), Respondents.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 16, 2008.
